The
Acquistion
of MOMA

During the last hundred years, MOMA in New York has had acquired millions of collection since it set up in the year of 1929. This project shows the process of its acuqistion. And interestingly, we will find there are some new type of art work became valuable collection start from a time by this data analysis.
Scroll down to explore the last hudred years collection. Also, search for the special artist's work at top.

COLLECTION NUMBER OF EACH YEAR, EACH DEPARTMENT

About

This project was the final project of visualiztion technology course in Northeatern University.
This data information was come from Kaggle Datasets. For further information, please visit www.kaggle.com.
